summary: Deployed web app on Internet Computer (caffeine.xyz) with an admin role/access control requirement; production dashboard route currently not loading.
architectural_notes: Deployment target appears to be an Internet Computer canister served via caffeine.xyz; frontend assets served from an asset canister.
App includes an admin role tied to Internet Computer principal IDs (principal-based authorization).
known_issues: Production URL https://xtask-3p7.caffeine.xyz/app/dashboard never loads (possible missing/broken frontend asset deployment or routing to empty asset canister).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add/update admin access control to make principal vtyfq-kcl6h-mvrxs-ixdx3-ew454-lywvd-3om5o-z3adc-gankr-lwzz2-jae an admin

Update the backend admin allowlist so that Principal `vtyfq-kcl6h-mvrxs-ixdx3-ew454-lywvd-3om5o-z3adc-gankr-lwzz2-jae` is recognized as an admin by the canister (i.e., `AccessControl.isAdmin(accessControlState, caller)` returns true for that Principal) and can access all existing admin-only methods.

projectName: Allowlist a specific Principal as admin
